title: Passion, Metaverse, Self-Doubt & SaveSoil | Nico Rosberg & Sadhguru
body: Former Formula One World Champion, Nico Rosberg, discusses metaverse, self-doubt, passion, technologies and the #SaveSoil movement with Sadhguru.

title: Eclipse and Food – Life Sense, not Internet Science | Sadhguru
body: Is it true that you should not eat during an eclipse? While such food won’t kill you, says Sadhguru, it will lower your perception. For a yogi, the loss of sensitivity is as good as death, he explains. Like a high-performance vehicle, if you want to function at your highest, you must look carefully at what kind of fuel goes into you.

title: Bahrain’s Oldest Souq Hosts Sadhguru
body: During the Middle Eastern leg of the #SaveSoil movement, Bahrain’s oldest souq in Manama hosted Sadhguru.

title: KGF Actress Srinidhi Shetty Asks Sadhguru About His Love for Mysuru
body: Lead actress of the popular Kannada films KGF & KGF2, Srinidhi Shetty, catches up with Sadhguru in his hometown Mysuru during the #SaveSoil journey, and discusses Sadhguru’s love for the city, and the #SaveSoil movement.

title: Learn How To Improve Your Brain’s Memory & Recall | Sadhguru Exclusive
body: Considered among India’s 50 most influential people, Sadhguru is a yogi, mystic, bestselling author, and poet. Absolute clarity of perception places him in a unique space, not only in matters spiritual but in business, environmental and international affairs, and opens a new door on all that he touches.

title: How Not to Fall Asleep During Meditation | Sadhguru
body: Sadhguru gives a simple and effective tip – eating 24 morsels of food and chewing each morsel 24 times – to stay alert throughout the day, create the right condition in the body to become meditative and to keep the doctor away for life.
